column1: PART 2: Please answer the following self-reflection questions:
1.What would you consider the most challenging in learning  your  language in this  month?
Not as  much speaking practice as I would like because of the new afternoon class change
2.What actions have you taken that were most helpful in meeting your goals/challenges
Signed up for 1 on 1 speaking once a  week.
3.What would you like to  focus on next month?
I would  like more  speaking opportunities in class.
